data.text: Yahweh, my God,, I give myself to you.
I trust in you.
Do not allow any of those who trust in you to be disappointed/disgraced.
Yahweh, show me the way that I should ◄conduct my life/live as you want me to►,
Teach me to conduct my life by obeying your truth
Yahweh, do not forget how you have acted mercifully to me and have faithfully loved me;
Forgive me for all the sinful things I did and the ways that I rebelled against you when I was young;
Yahweh is good and fair/just;
He shows humble people what is right for them to do
He always faithfully loves and does what he has promised
Yahweh, forgive me for all my sins, which are many,
To all those who revere you [RHQ],
They will always be prosperous,
Yahweh is a friend of those who have an awesome respect for him,
I always ask [MTY] Yahweh to help me,
Yahweh, pay attention to me and be merciful to me, because I am alone,
Help me to not worry,
Note that I am distressed and troubled [DOU],
Also note that I have many enemies,
Protect me, and rescue me from them;
Protect me because I do what is good and honest/just [PRS],
God, rescue us Israeli people from all of our troubles!
